definitions: the level normally reached by the water on the side of a ship.
shortDefinitions: level normally reached by water on side of ship

definitions: the level reached by the sea or a river visible as a line on a rock face, beach, or riverbank

examples.text: he was coming back along the waterline with the dog trotting at his heels

shortDefinitions: level reached by sea or river visible as line on rock face

definitions: any of a set of structural lines of a ship, parallel with the surface of the water, representing the contour of the hull at various heights above the keel and drawn on shipbuilding plans.
shortDefinitions: any of various structural lines of ship, parallel with surface of water, representing contour of hull at various heights above keel

definitions: a vertical watermark made in laid paper.
the rim of the upper or lower eyelid between the lashes and the eye itself (especially with reference to the application of eye makeup)

examples.text: line the waterline with the black eyeliner

shortDefinitions: rim of upper or lower eyelid between lashes and eye itself
